title: I have business ideas to make some software but I don't have knowledge of IT so how can I start my business? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have a business idea to develop a Website or Mobile App ?? Your question caught my eye.. Many people ask me to tell them about top web and mobile app development company in a specific region. Well, there is no need to be specific in region. Almost all the successful websites and mobile app that are currently growing are outsourced or developed in different countries. If I talk about Seattle , the development cost for website and mobile apps are touching sky. If you are thinking to get your idea deployed trust me India is best for it. They have skilled and professional companies ready to work on your project at pocket friendly price. And trust me there is no difference in the quality offered. Even if I compare both, Indian companies will be more towards reliability and efficiency. Now comes the point which company to choose to from India. Well there are hundreds of companies in India. Okay to make it easy for you, I can recommend you one of the top notch company known for its methodology and amazing designs- TecOrb Technologies. TecOrb Technologies is an Indian IT firm, which have developed 300+ projects for its client situated in all four corners of globe. They are proficient in developing mobile apps and website. All the apps that they have developed have 4–5 start rating on iOS App store and Google Play Store. Clients of this company are earning huge revenue from the solutions provided by TecOrb. They use cutting edge technology to develop the software and infact they also have dedicated teams for all phase of software development - Requirement analyzing, Designing, Developing & Testing. If I am asked to rate , then i will give ten on ten to this company for providing quality services at lowest cost.  I am attaching the banner of this company. If you have an idea to get your website or mobile app developed from TecOrb Technologies , feel free to connect with them and get free quote.

Aditya , To run a business, an idea alone won't help The best way for you to start your business is to first understand the basics of setting up a startup, what is required to do so and then fit your idea into it to understand how feasible it will be and most importantly how much money you may need to invest in it. Click this link https://startupindia.upgrad.com/login?redirect=startupindia.upgrad.com/v/course/15& This is a free course and it will provide you all the required knowledge to start a business. I wish you good luck
